item.title: Closed for now
item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?
item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

Application form:

Position: Server Coder
Timezone: Eastern…US
Age: 17
E-Mail: srs-bsns@live.com
Years of experience with rsps: 2-3
How many hours a day (on average) can you dedicate to this private server? Weekdays: 6 - 7 hours Friday: 2-3 (With girlfriend mostly on fridays) Weekends: Sun up to sun down. (Sometimes even all-nighters if prompted)
Example of your work: I’ve coded and hosted numerous servers…but due to lack of support I shut them down.
Can you come up with new ideas? Yes.
Can you meet deadlines? Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed for now
item.dc:creator: @_Pandemonium `Pandemonium
item.description:
@_Pandemonium wrote:

DePredaTe:

Funding? What kind of funding could this server possibly need? a vps? lol. Thats what a development team leader is supposed to do. Maybe a website? But thats also what a VPS could do. So, really… The funding part isnt that much. Hell I have my own person server I rent out to people, its not that hard to find someone to lend you one for a staff position. And for advertising, that also doesn’t take alot to do. It’s mostly just a one time thing, post on a few websites, yadda yadda. It’s not like you are going to pay people to run your ads on their websites. Coordinator also doesn’t take much, and that again is what a development team leader is supposed to be. PR Admin, thats hardly a position of great complexity. So to me, it seems like you are asking for a whole team while you sit back and do little to no work. Unless you are throwing in some coding hours, or actually spending the funds on important things such as professional coders, (which I doubt). Really, the only thing you are doing is maybe hosting the server. Which gives you no right to even assume yourself as an owner of a server.

This.

Read full topic

Funding? What kind of funding could this server possibly need? a vps? lol. Thats what a development team leader is supposed to do. Maybe a website? But thats also what a VPS could do. So, really… The funding part isnt that much. Hell I have my own person server I rent out to people, its not that hard to find someone to lend you one for a staff position. And for advertising, that also doesn’t take alot to do. It’s mostly just a one time thing, post on a few websites, yadda yadda. It’s not like you are going to pay people to run your ads on their websites. Coordinator also doesn’t take much, and that again is what a development team leader is supposed to be. PR Admin, thats hardly a position of great complexity. So to me, it seems like you are asking for a whole team while you sit back and do little to no work. Unless you are throwing in some coding hours, or actually spending the funds on important things such as professional coders, (which I doubt). Really, the only thing you are doing is maybe hosting the server. Which gives you no right to even assume yourself as an owner of a server.
